channel.title: Tools on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Blog

item.title: Texture Patisserie - Blender Texture Baking Addon
item.description: Blender Add-on for streamling the process of baking and exporting PBR textures.

item.title: Image Gallery Builder - Simple Scene Building tool for OpenGL
item.description: Perform rendering optimization through batching draw calls in a Custom OpenGL Rasterization Engine using Blinn-Phong Shading model. Designed for an image gallery scene building tool.
